subject: simsonn pro x
description_text:
Hello,

I have a problem with the Windows controller, the X rotation axis moves all the time, which generates a button press in games. How can I remove this axis?

Sincerely

conversations.body_text: Hi Jamal LAABBASSI, Are you using ProX Ultra or PlusX? Please confirm that your Simsonn Manager version is 2.1.0, then go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware, and select the corresponding .sfu firmware to update.

Thank you for your help.

Your product is great.

Sent from my mobile
Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
